messages.name: catalogInstructions
messages.text:
Select a catalog from the popup list at the bottom of the screen. Change the display options to alter its appearance.
Click on the subject headings to expand/collapse the list of links in that collection. Scroll through the list of links for that subject. Follow the links to access the different pages within the subject

messages.name: conversion
messages.text:
Temperatures

Gas mark 1 = 140C / 275F
Gas mark 2 = 150C / 300F
Gas mark 3 = 170C / 325F
Gas mark 4 = 180C / 350F
Gas mark 5 = 190C / 375F
Gas mark 6 = 200C / 400F
Gas mark 7 = 220C / 425F
Gas mark 8 = 240C / 475F
Gas mark 9 = 270C / 525F

Weights and Measures

1/4 cup = 60ml = 2oz = 56 grams
1/3 cup = 80ml = 2 3/4oz = 70 grams
1/2 cup = 120ml = 4oz = 112 grams
1 cup = 240ml = 8oz = 224 grams
